description: UMD 4.8.1 is an emergency fix of the fourth Major release of UMD. It adds a fix for FTS-Monitoring in CentOS7 that updates dependencies from python-django to python-django16.
releaseNotes: This emergency release includes a fix for FTS-Monitoring in CentOS7 that updates dependencies from python-django to python-django16.
installationNotes: <div>All products in UMD 4.8.1 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.</div><br/>
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: operations (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the <a href="https://ggus.eu/">EGI Helpdesk</a>&nbsp;to make a report.
changeLog: This emergency release includes a fix for FTS-Monitoring in CentOS7 that updates dependencies from python-django to python-django16.

products.name: fts3.fts3-monitoring
products.description: FTS3 is the service responsible for globally distributing the majority of the LHC data across the WLCG infrastructure. Is a low level data movement service, responsible for reliable bulk transfer of files from one site to another while allowing participating sites to control the network resource usage
